items.item_details:
Recess to Closed Session 
	 
Closed Session will commence at the end of Open Session in the Superintendent's Conference Room at approximately 6:30 p.m. 
	 
See item 7 on agenda (Closed Session).

items.item_details:
I pledge allegiance
to the flag of the
United States of America
and to the Republic
for which it stands
one nation under God
indivisible with liberty
and justice for all.
Information explaining Board meeting procedures and how citizens can address the Board will be read. Written information is located near the entrance to the Board Room.
